title: DirectX Error happens often. PLEASE HELP!
body:
As the image showed, I had this more often in these days. It keeps saying my video card has to be updated but actually I have done it.
Can somebody please sends help, I really miss this game though.
Well, shout out to anybody helps me. Much appreciated!

replies.body:
Try updating your DirectX install (never download anything DIrectX related from anywhere except the microsoft website):

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35
